entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 324,899Chapters: 29/40Kudos: 828

Summary: “Have you ever heard of the butterfly effect?”He looked up and shook his head. “No… what is it?”“It’s the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it’s wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.”He nodded, that’s exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place… then none of this would be happening.But fuck it, ‘caution’ isn’t in his vocabulary.~~~UPDATES BIWEEKLY <3

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,593Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 105

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn’t.No explanations, no goodbyes—just the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn’t understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don’t need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.title: Waiting In The Wings
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,271Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 59

Summary: Melissa folded her arms and stared at Stiles, “I’m still having a hard time believing that Derek Hale, of all people, is your boyfriend now.”“Yep! Derek’s my boyfriend! We’re totally rocking the whole relationship thing. I mean, we’re no Scott and Allison when it comes to PDA, but we’re both very affectionate behind closed doors. It’s kind of hilarious actually, because some people think that Derek doesn’t even like me when we’re in public, just because he growls or glares at me from time to time. But we’re just a misunderstood couple, y’know… Kind of like other star-crossed lovers out there. We’re basically this generation’s Romeo and… Miguel.”Melissa was grinning so wide that her face almost hurt. Stiles had wildly overcompensated, and now she knew he was lying.“If you and Derek are boyfriends, you won’t have a problem inviting him over for dinner then.”Stiles malfunctioned for a full second before squawking like a dying bird, “Dinner?!”

entry.title: Hale Confessions: The Stilinski Twin Edition
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 591Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: Peter and Derek Hale sit together in the loft, drinking whiskey and discussing the challenges of being with the Stilinski twins. Derek vents about his tumultuous relationship with Stiles—how they fight, make up, and fight again—but admits that when Stiles loves, he loves completely. Peter shares his own experiences with Isabelle, calling her stubborn and infuriating yet the best thing that ever happened to him.Despite the chaos, both men acknowledge that the Stilinskis love with an intensity that is rare and unwavering. Their loyalty is absolute, and no matter how much frustration they cause, neither Peter nor Derek would ever walk away. They toast to surviving the Stilinskis, knowing full well they never stood a chance against them in the first place.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,263Chapters: 18/26Kudos: 226

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega… Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: DON’T DIE, DUMBASS
entry.summary:
Author: Noctirax

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,393Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Stiles was certain—utterly certain—there had been someone in the middle of the road. Sure, the figure had moved with an unnatural quickness, vanishing as suddenly as he appeared but that didn't mean anything. Just standard Beacon Hills bullshit—home to the strange and unexplained. No, that wasn't what bothered him. What bothered him was that he hadn’t just seen someone. He’d seen someone he was damn sure he knew. Dark hair against pale skin, and leather jacket over broad shoulders, body squared, braced for impact. It was a posture Stiles had seen countless times, most often standing between him and something that was trying to rip his throat out. For a fleeting second, amidst the screech of tires and the adrenaline flooding his system, Stiles could have sworn he’d seen Derek Hale standing in the middle of the road. Only that wasn't possible because Derek was dead, very, very dead.

entry.title: Iron Gilded Void
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,004Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 83

Summary: Things fall apart for Stiles in Beacon Hills and he and the Hale men in his life end up with his uncles in New York City. "Guys, it's fine," Stiles said, stepping forward. "Stiles, it’s not fine!" Derek snapped, not taking his eyes off James. "Do you fucking know who that is?!" Stiles blinked at him, then at Peter, whose entire body was coiled so tightly he looked ready to launch himself at James at any second. With a sigh, Stiles rubbed his face. “Yes. That’s Uncle James.”

entry.title: I am the Lorax, I speak for the Trees
entry.summary:
Author: seaweedly

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,312Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 197

Summary: It’s not like Stiles had intended to keep his non-human-ness from the pack. Truely he thought they knew. It’s not like he had been particularly good at hiding the fact that he was the literal guardian of the Beacon Hills forests.— or —The five times Stiles blatantly shows his true power around the pack without them realising it.And the one time they actually talk about the fact Stiles is not exactly human.
